properties.displayName: UC-Custom - Windows - Deletion/ Enable/ Disable of Suspicious Scheduled Task
properties.description: Deletion/ Enable/ Disable of Suspicious Scheduled Task
properties.query:
let knowntasks = dynamic (["Windows Defender Cleanup",
    "RunAADCHTestConnectivityAsSystem",
    "Windows Defender Scheduled Scan",
    "Windows Defender Verification",
    "Windows Defender Cache Maintenance",
    "Windows Defender Scheduled Scan",
    "Windows Defender Verification",
    "Windows Defender Cache Maintenance",
    "Windows Defender Cleanup",
    "Microsoft Antimalware Scheduled Scan",
    "AC Power Download",
    "AC Power Install",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateBrowserReplacementTask",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateTaskMachineUA",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateBrowserReplacementTask",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateTaskMachineCore",
    "MusUx_LogonUpdateResults",
    "CreateExplorerShellUnelevatedTask",
    "TimeBasedEvents",
    "Dell SupportAssistAgent AutoUpdate",
    "OneDrive Per-Machine Standalone Update Task",
    "Office Automatic Updates 2.0",
    "OfficeTelemetryAgentFallBack2016",
    "OfficeTelemetryAgentLogOn2016",
    "Office Feature Updates",
    "SetupCleanupTask",
    "OneDrive Standalone Update Task",
    "Adobe Acrobat Update Task",
    "AC Power Install",
    "BackgroundDownload",
    "Policy Install",
    "MusUx_LogonReboot",
    "EnterpriseMgmt",
    "Universal Orchestrator Start",
    "Schedule Retry Scan",
    "Office ClickToRun Service Monitor",
    "OfficeBackgroundTaskHandlerLogon",
    "OfficeBackgroundTaskHandlerRegistration",
    "Office Subscription Maintenance",
    "Configuration Manager Health Evaluation",
    "Configuration Manager Client Upgrade Task",
    "RemoteFXvGPUDisableTask",
    "RemoteFXWarningTask",
    "Intel® Management and Security Status",
    "GroupPolicy",
    "User_Feed_Synchronization",
    "Office Serviceability Manager",
    "ScheduledDefrag",
    "Reboot_Battery",
    "Reboot_AC",
    "Office Feature Updates Logon",
    "ThemesSyncedImageDownload", "PrinterCleanupTask", "ExpediteCleanup",
    "Office Feature Updates",
    "Resume App Installation Actions",
    "ThemesSyncedImageDownload",
    "PrinterCleanupTask",
    "ExpediteCleanup",
    "Yoda_Prod_Backup",
    "Sql StartUp",
    "SqlStartUp",
    "Office Performance Monitor",
    "Queued Schedule created for queued alerts",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateTaskMachineCore1d88f6b6e0be3e1",
    "AC Power Download", "Trend Micro Endpoint Basecamp", "PushLaunch", "PushRenewal"]); //INC2858775 PushLaunch PushLaunch
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4699, 4670, 4671)
| parse kind =relaxed EventData with * "TaskName" TaskName "TaskContent"*
| extend Scheduledtask= extract("\\\\([\\w\\s]+)\\<", 1, TaskName)
| where Scheduledtask !in (knowntasks) and isnotempty(Scheduledtask) 
| summarize start_time=min(TimeGenerated), end_time=max(TimeGenerated) by Scheduledtask, Computer, Activity

properties.displayName: UC-EX-1501 - Windows - Suspicious powershell execution
properties.description: Windows - Suspicious PowerShell execution
properties.query:
// The query_now parameter represents the time (in UTC) at which the scheduled analytics rule ran to produce this alert.
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4688 and Account !contains "$"
| where Account !in~ ("ccpadmin", "gccadmin","AD\\PowerAutomate")
| where Process contains "powershell.exe" or Process contains "powershell_ise.exe"
| where ParentProcessName !contains "VS Code"
| where CommandLine !contains "Get-Process"
| where CommandLine in~ (
"-EncodedCommand","Invoke-WebRequest",
"IEX",
"-ExecutionPolicy Bypass",
"FromBase64String",
"Invoke-Expression",
"Net.WebClient",
"DownloadFile",
"Invoke-RestMethod",
"Reflection.Assembly",
"Add-Type",
"VirtualAlloc",
"WriteProcessMemory",
"Set-ItemProperty",
"New-ItemProperty",
"Register-ScheduledTask",
"Get-Credential",
"Get-Content",
"password",
"Security.Cryptography"
)
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Account,
    AccountType,
    Computer,
    EventID,
    Activity,
    NewProcessName,
    CommandLine,
    ParentProcessName,
    Process,
    SubjectUserName
| summarize StartTime = min(TimeGenerated), EndTime = max(TimeGenerated)
    by
    Account,
    AccountType,
    Computer,
    EventID,
    Activity,
    NewProcessName,
    CommandLine,
    ParentProcessName,
    Process,
    SubjectUserName

properties.displayName: UC-DE-874 - Windows - Failed Code Integrity Checks
properties.description: This rule identifies integrity of file hash.
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in ("5038", "6281")
| extend FileName = tostring(split(EventData, "\\")[-1])
| extend EventFile= extract(@"(.*\.\w+)", 1, FileName)
| where EventFile !in~ ("prefs_enclave_x64.dll", "dual_engine_adapter_x64.dll")
| project-away FileName
| summarize EndTime = max(TimeGenerated), count() by Computer, EventID, Activity, EventData, EventFile

properties.displayName: Windows-Account Enabled
properties.description: This rule identifies the events when an account is enabled in Windows.
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == "4722"
| where SubjectUserName != "admrussell"
| where AccountType !contains "machine"
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Computer,
    TargetUserName,
    TargetSid,
    SubjectUserName,
    SubjectUserSid

properties.displayName: UC-EX-1118 - Windows - Powershell Download
properties.description: Powershell Download
properties.query:
let timeframe = 12h; 
SecurityEvent 
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeframe)  
| where EventID == 4688 
| where Process in~ ("powershell.exe", "powershell_ise.exe") 
| where CommandLine has "Net.WebClient" 
    or CommandLine has "DownloadFile" 
    or CommandLine has "Invoke-WebRequest" and CommandLine !contains "microsoft.com"
    or CommandLine has "Invoke-Shellcode" 
    or CommandLine contains "http:" 
| where Computer !contains "DEV"
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, AccountName, ParentProcessName, CommandLine, Account
| where Account !in ("AD\\CAP_SRV_NESSUS_HL", "AD\\CAP_SRV_NES_HL_DC")
| where Account !contains "$"

properties.displayName: UC-PE-1157 - Windows - User added to a security enabled group
properties.description: Windows - User added to a security enabled group
properties.query:
let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist('security_enabled_group_users') | project SearchKey);
SecurityEvent
| where EventID=="4728" or EventID == "4732"
| where AccountType !contains "Machine"
| where Account !contains "AD\\admHarper"
| where SubjectUserName !in (watchlist) and isnotempty( SubjectUserName)
| summarize by TimeGenerated,Account,SubjectUserName,Activity, TargetAccount, MemberName

properties.displayName: User account created or deleted in Windows
properties.description: This use case identifies user accounts created and deleted in windows within the specified timerange.
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where AccountType == "User" 
| where EventID in (4726, 4720)
//4726 - A user account was deleted
//4720 -A user account was created
| where Account !in~ ("AD\\capswainr" ,"AD\\admrussell" , "AD\\HT001840")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Account,
    Computer,
    EventData,
    EventID,
    Activity,
    AffectedUser=TargetUserName,
    AffectedUserSID=TargetSid,
    Initiator=SubjectAccount,
    GroupName=TargetAccount
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

properties.displayName: UC-DE-505 - Windows - Windows Event Logging Service Shut down
properties.description: Windows - Windows Event Logging Service Shut down
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 1100
//| search "The event logging service has shut down"
|where IpAddress != "10.143.8.28"
| where dayofweek(TimeGenerated) != time(6.00:00:00) // Saturday
| where dayofweek(TimeGenerated) != time(0.00:00:00) // Sunday

properties.displayName: UC-PE-1851 - Windows - Account Created-Local Account
properties.description: Windows-Account Created-Local Account
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4720
| where SubjectDomainName !contains "heartland"
| where Account !contains "admrussell"

properties.displayName: UC-PE-750 - Windows - Account Added to Privileged Group and Removed in 1 Day
properties.description: Windows - Account Added to Privileged Group and Removed in 1 Day
properties.query:
let time_ago = 2d; 
let time_delta = 1d; 
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(time_ago) 
| where EventID in(4728, 4732)
| project
    TimeAdded=TimeGenerated,
    GroupName=TargetUserName,
    MemberName,
    SubjectUserName,
    IpAddress,
    Computer
| join ( 
    SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(time_ago) 
    | where EventID in(4729, 4733)
    | project
        TimeRemoved=TimeGenerated,
        GroupName=TargetUserName,
        MemberName,
        SubjectUserName,
        IpAddress,
        Computer
    )
    on MemberName, GroupName
| where TimeRemoved < (TimeAdded + time_delta) 
| project TimeAdded, TimeRemoved, MemberName, SubjectUserName, GroupName, IpAddress, Computer

properties.displayName: UC-CA-904 - Windows - Multiple Login Failures from the Same Source
properties.description: Windows - Multiple Login Failures from the Same Source
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4625, 4776)
| where AccountType != "Machine"
| where Status != "0x0"
| summarize dcount(TargetUserName), UserName_list=make_set(TargetUserName), make_set(Status),evtcount=count()  by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| where evtcount >= 15 and dcount_TargetUserName > 2

properties.displayName: Excessive Windows logon failures
properties.description: User has over 50 Windows logon failures today and at least 33% of the count of logon failures over the previous 7 days.
properties.query:
let starttime = 8d;
let endtime = 1d;
let threshold = 0.333;
let countlimit = 50;
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(endtime)
| where EventID == 4625 and AccountType =~ "User"
| where IpAddress !in ("127.0.0.1", "::1","-")
| summarize StartTime = min(TimeGenerated), EndTime = max(TimeGenerated), CountToday = count() by EventID, Account, LogonTypeName, SubStatus, AccountType, Computer, WorkstationName, IpAddress, Process
| join kind=leftouter (
    SecurityEvent 
    | where TimeGenerated between (ago(starttime) .. ago(endtime))
    | where EventID == 4625 and AccountType =~ "User"
    | where IpAddress !in ("127.0.0.1", "::1","-")
    | summarize CountPrev7day = count() by EventID, Account, LogonTypeName, SubStatus, AccountType, Computer, WorkstationName, IpAddress
) on EventID, Account, LogonTypeName, SubStatus, AccountType, Computer, WorkstationName, IpAddress
| where CountToday >= coalesce(CountPrev7day,0)*threshold and CountToday >= countlimit
//SubStatus Codes are detailed here - https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/security/threat-protection/auditing/event-4625
| extend Reason = case(
SubStatus =~ '0xC000005E', 'There are currently no logon servers available to service the logon request.',
SubStatus =~ '0xC0000064', 'User logon with misspelled or bad user account',
SubStatus =~ '0xC000006A', 'User logon with misspelled or bad password',    
SubStatus =~ '0xC000006D', 'Bad user name or password',
SubStatus =~ '0xC000006E', 'Unknown user name or bad password',
SubStatus =~ '0xC000006F', 'User logon outside authorized hours',
SubStatus =~ '0xC0000070', 'User logon from unauthorized workstation',
SubStatus =~ '0xC0000071', 'User logon with expired password',
SubStatus =~ '0xC0000072', 'User logon to account disabled by administrator',
SubStatus =~ '0xC00000DC', 'Indicates the Sam Server was in the wrong state to perform the desired operation',  
SubStatus =~ '0xC0000133', 'Clocks between DC and other computer too far out of sync',
SubStatus =~ '0xC000015B', 'The user has not been granted the requested logon type (aka logon right) at this machine',
SubStatus =~ '0xC000018C', 'The logon request failed because the trust relationship between the primary domain and the trusted domain failed',
SubStatus =~ '0xC0000192', 'An attempt was made to logon, but the Netlogon service was not started',
SubStatus =~ '0xC0000193', 'User logon with expired account',
SubStatus =~ '0xC0000224', 'User is required to change password at next logon',
SubStatus =~ '0xC0000225', 'Evidently a bug in Windows and not a risk',
SubStatus =~ '0xC0000234', 'User logon with account locked',
SubStatus =~ '0xC00002EE', 'Failure Reason: An Error occurred during Logon',
SubStatus =~ '0xC0000413', 'Logon Failure: The machine you are logging onto is protected by an authentication firewall. The specified account is not allowed to authenticate to the machine',
strcat('Unknown reason substatus: ', SubStatus))
| extend WorkstationName = iff(WorkstationName == "-" or isempty(WorkstationName), Computer , WorkstationName) 
| project StartTime, EndTime, EventID, Account, LogonTypeName, SubStatus, Reason, AccountType, Computer, WorkstationName, IpAddress, CountToday, CountPrev7day, Avg7Day = round(CountPrev7day*1.00/7,2), Process
| summarize StartTime = min(StartTime), EndTime = max(EndTime), Computer = make_set(Computer,128), IpAddressList = make_set(IpAddress,128), sum(CountToday), sum(CountPrev7day), avg(Avg7Day) 
by EventID, Account, LogonTypeName, SubStatus, Reason, AccountType, WorkstationName, Process
| order by sum_CountToday desc nulls last 
| extend timestamp = StartTime, AccountCustomEntity = Account, HostCustomEntity = WorkstationName

properties.displayName: UC-EX-773 - Windows - Creation of Suspicious Scheduled Task
properties.description: Creation of Suspicious Scheduled Task
properties.query:
let knowntasks = dynamic (["Windows Defender Cleanup",
    "RunAADCHTestConnectivityAsSystem",
    "Windows Defender Scheduled Scan",
    "Windows Defender Verification",
    "Windows Defender Cache Maintenance",
    "Windows Defender Scheduled Scan",
    "Windows Defender Verification",
    "Windows Defender Cache Maintenance",
    "Windows Defender Cleanup",
    "Microsoft Antimalware Scheduled Scan",
    "AC Power Download",
    "AC Power Install",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateBrowserReplacementTask",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateTaskMachineUA",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateBrowserReplacementTask",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateTaskMachineCore",
    "MusUx_LogonUpdateResults",
    "CreateExplorerShellUnelevatedTask",
    "TimeBasedEvents",
    "Dell SupportAssistAgent AutoUpdate",
    "OneDrive Per-Machine Standalone Update Task",
    "Office Automatic Updates 2.0",
    "OfficeTelemetryAgentFallBack2016",
    "OfficeTelemetryAgentLogOn2016",
    "Office Feature Updates",
    "SetupCleanupTask",
    "OneDrive Standalone Update Task",
    "Adobe Acrobat Update Task",
    "AC Power Install",
    "BackgroundDownload",
    "Policy Install",
    "MusUx_LogonReboot",
    "EnterpriseMgmt",
    "Universal Orchestrator Start",
    "Schedule Retry Scan",
    "Office ClickToRun Service Monitor",
    "OfficeBackgroundTaskHandlerLogon",
    "OfficeBackgroundTaskHandlerRegistration",
    "Office Subscription Maintenance",
    "Configuration Manager Health Evaluation",
    "Configuration Manager Client Upgrade Task",
    "RemoteFXvGPUDisableTask",
    "RemoteFXWarningTask",
    "Intel® Management and Security Status",
    "GroupPolicy",
    "User_Feed_Synchronization",
    "Office Serviceability Manager",
    "ScheduledDefrag",
    "Reboot_Battery",
    "Reboot_AC",
    "Office Feature Updates Logon",
    "ThemesSyncedImageDownload", "PrinterCleanupTask", "ExpediteCleanup",
    "Office Feature Updates",
    "Resume App Installation Actions",
    "ThemesSyncedImageDownload",

    "Sql StartUp",
    "SqlStartUp",

    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateTaskMachineCore1d88f6b6e0be3e1",
    "AC Power Download", "Trend Micro Endpoint Basecamp", "PushLaunch", "PushRenewal"]); //INC2858775 PushLaunch PushLaunch
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4698
| parse kind =relaxed EventData with * "TaskName" TaskName "TaskContent"*
| extend Scheduledtask= extract("\\\\([\\w\\s]+)\\<", 1, TaskName)
| where Scheduledtask !in (knowntasks) and isnotempty(Scheduledtask) 
| summarize start_time=min(TimeGenerated), end_time=max(TimeGenerated) by Scheduledtask, Computer

properties.displayName: Windows-Account Created
properties.description: This rule identifies the events when an account is created in Windows
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == "4720"
| where SubjectUserName <> "admrussell"
| project TimeGenerated,Computer,TargetUserName, TargetSid,SubjectUserName,SubjectUserSid

properties.displayName: UC-PR-1502 - Windows - Privilege escalation detection
properties.description: Windows - Privilege escalation detection
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
|where EventID in (4673, 4674)

properties.displayName: UC-DE-863 - Windows - Event Auditing disabled
properties.description: Discovers disabling event logging. Attackers oftentimes disable event logging in order to hide their actions, therefore, this may indicate that the system has been compromised
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
//| where TimeGenerated >=ago(1h)
| where EventID ==1100
| summarize dcount(EventID) by Computer, Activity, TimeGenerated
|where dcount_EventID >0

properties.displayName: UC-CA-1558 - Windows - Suspicious user name nomenclature
properties.description: Detect when the user name doesn't match the nomenclature of the company. Can be a proof of the usage of a crafted ticket.
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in(4624, 4768, 4769)
| where SubjectAccount !contains "heartland"
    and SubjectAccount !contains "$"
    and Computer !contains "dev"
    and Computer !contains "uat"
| where EventID in(4624, 4768, 4769)
| where SubjectAccount !contains "heartland" and SubjectAccount != @"-\-" and isnotempty(SubjectAccount)
    and SubjectAccount !contains "$"
    and Computer !contains "dev"
    and Computer !contains "uat"
| where AccountType !contains "machine"
| where Account != "AD\\PowerAutomate" and Process contains "UIFlowService.exe" //INC2856634 
| summarize start_time=min(TimeGenerated), end_time=max(TimeGenerated), count()
    by
    Account,
    Computer,
    EventID,
    LogonTypeName,
    ProcessName,
    SubjectAccount,
    SubjectUserName,
    TargetAccount,
    TargetUserName,
    TargetDomainName,
    WorkstationName
| project-reorder start_time, end_time
//| where TargetDomainName !contains "NT Service"

properties.displayName: UC-EX.PE.PR-990 - Windows - Suspicious scheduled task created
properties.description: Windows - Suspicious scheduled task created
properties.query:
let knowntasks = dynamic (["Windows Defender Cleanup",
    "Windows Defender Scheduled Scan",
    "Windows Defender Verification",
    "Windows Defender Cache Maintenance",
    "Windows Defender Scheduled Scan",
    "Windows Defender Verification",
    "Windows Defender Cache Maintenance",
    "Windows Defender Cleanup",
    "Microsoft Antimalware Scheduled Scan",
    "AC Power Download",
    "AC Power Install",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateBrowserReplacementTask",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateTaskMachineUA",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateBrowserReplacementTask",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateTaskMachineCore",
    "MusUx_LogonUpdateResults",
    "CreateExplorerShellUnelevatedTask",
    "TimeBasedEvents",
    "Dell SupportAssistAgent AutoUpdate",
    "OneDrive Per-Machine Standalone Update Task",
    "Office Automatic Updates 2.0",
    "OfficeTelemetryAgentFallBack2016",
    "OfficeTelemetryAgentLogOn2016",
    "Office Feature Updates",
    "SetupCleanupTask",
    "OneDrive Standalone Update Task",
    "Adobe Acrobat Update Task",
    "AC Power Install",
    "BackgroundDownload",
    "Policy Install",
    "MusUx_LogonReboot",
    "EnterpriseMgmt",
    "Universal Orchestrator Start",
    "Schedule Retry Scan",
    "Office ClickToRun Service Monitor",
    "OfficeBackgroundTaskHandlerLogon",
    "OfficeBackgroundTaskHandlerRegistration",
    "Office Subscription Maintenance",
    "Configuration Manager Health Evaluation",
    "Configuration Manager Client Upgrade Task",
    "RemoteFXvGPUDisableTask",
    "RemoteFXWarningTask",
    "Intel® Management and Security Status",
    "GroupPolicy",
    "User_Feed_Synchronization",
    "Office Serviceability Manager",
    "ScheduledDefrag",
    "Reboot_Battery",
    "Reboot_AC",
    "Office Feature Updates Logon",
    "ThemesSyncedImageDownload", "PrinterCleanupTask", "ExpediteCleanup",
    "Office Feature Updates",
    "Resume App Installation Actions",
    "ThemesSyncedImageDownload",
    "PrinterCleanupTask",
    "ExpediteCleanup",
    "Yoda_Prod_Backup",
    "Sql StartUp",
    "SqlStartUp",
    "Office Performance Monitor",
    "Queued Schedule created for queued alerts",
    "MicrosoftEdgeUpdateTaskMachineCore1d88f6b6e0be3e1", "SCOM 2007 Agent Resume Task",
    "AC Power Download", "Trend Micro Endpoint Basecamp", "PushLaunch", "PushRenewal"]); //INC2858775 PushLaunch PushLaunch
SecurityEvent
//| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1h)
| where EventID == 4698 or EventID == 602
| parse kind =relaxed EventData with * "TaskName" TaskName "TaskContent"*
| extend User = extract(@"<Data Name=""SubjectUserName"">([^<]+)</Data>", 1, EventData)
| extend Scheduledtask= extract("\\\\([\\w\\s]+)\\<", 1, TaskName)
| where Scheduledtask !in (knowntasks) and isnotempty(Scheduledtask) 
| where User !endswith "$"

properties.displayName: UC-DE-762 - Windows - Audit Policy Changed, Cleared or Terminated
properties.description: Windows - Audit Policy Changed, Cleared or Terminated
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4715, 4719, 4907, 4912)
| where Account !endswith "$"

properties.displayName: UC-CA-903 - Windows - Multiple Login Failures for Single Username with logon type 2 - HL
properties.description: Windows - Multiple Login Failures for Single Username with logon type 2 - HL
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID  == "4625"
| where LogonType == 2
| where AccountType == "User"
| summarize failurecount=count() by TargetUserName, IpAddress, Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| where failurecount >= 10

properties.displayName: UC-CA-903 - Windows - Multiple Login Failures for Single Username
properties.description: Windows - Multiple Login Failures for Single Username
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4625
| where AccountType == "User"
| where Account !endswith "$" and Account != "-"
| where IpAddress != "::1" and IpAddress != "127.0.0.1"
| where IpAddress != '10.127.9.24' or TargetUserName != "SA_LanSw_Scan@heartlandcocacola.com"
| summarize make_set(TimeGenerated), evtcount=count() by TargetUserName, IpAddress, Computer, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
| where evtcount >= 20

properties.displayName: UC-LM-954 - Windows - RDP from same source to multiple destination
properties.description: Windows - RDP from same source to multiple destination
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4624 or EventID == 4625
| where LogonType == 10
| where isnotempty(IpAddress) and IpAddress != "::1"
//| where IpPort == 3389
//| where (ipv4_is_match("10.0.0.0", IpAddress, 8) or ipv4_is_match("172.16.0.0",IpAddress, 12) or ipv4_is_match("192.168.0.0", IpAddress, 16) or ipv4_is_match("192.0.0.0", IpAddress, 16))
//|summarize make_set()
| summarize
    starttime=min(TimeGenerated),
    enndtime=max(TimeGenerated),
    uniquedestinationcount= dcount(Computer),computer = make_set(Computer),account = make_set(UserPrincipalName),
    Destination=make_set(Computer),
    RDPcount= count()
    by IpAddress, bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)
| where uniquedestinationcount > 1
| where RDPcount >= 5

properties.displayName: UC-DE-899 - Windows - Microsoft Malware Protection Engine Crash
properties.description: Detects the creation of a user with the "$" character. This can be used by attackers to hide a user or trick detection systems that lack the parsing mechanisms.
properties.query:
Event
| where (EventID == 1000 and Source == "Application Error") or (EventID == 1001 and Source == "Windows Error Reporting")
| where RenderedDescription has_any ("MsMpEng.exe", "mpengine.dll")

properties.displayName: UC-CA-905 - Windows - Multiple Login Failures to the Same Destination
properties.description: Windows - Multiple Login Failures to the Same Destination
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4625
//| where LogonType !in (3)
//| where IpAddress !in~ ("::1", "-")
| where Account !endswith "$"
| summarize
    StartTime = min(TimeGenerated),
    EndTime = max(TimeGenerated),
    IPCount=dcount(IpAddress),
    Computer=make_set(Computer),
    count()
    by Account, TargetUserName, bin(TimeGenerated, 15m),IpAddress
| where count_ >= 250
//| project-reorder StartTime, EndTime

properties.displayName: UC-DE-1527 - Windows - File permission change detected
properties.description: File permission change detected
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4670
| where ObjectType contains "File"
| where Account !contains "$" or AccountType !contains "Machine"
| where Computer !contains "DEV" // As these are DEV  Environment

properties.displayName: UC-EX-1003 - Windows - Unusual Process (ex: word, iexplore, AcroRd..) Launched a Command Shell
properties.description: Unusual Process (ex: word, iexplore, AcroRd..) Launched a Command Shell
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4688
| where NewProcessName matches regex @"((cmd)|(powershell)|(rundll32)|(wscript)|(scrcons)|(cscript)|(bash)|(sh))\.exe"
| where ParentProcessName matches regex @"((iexplore)|(winword)|(powerpnt)|(excel)|(access)|(notepad)|(outlook)|(calc)|(iexplore)|(mspub)|(visio)|(AcroRd\d\d))\.exe"

properties.displayName: UC-PR-1152 - AD - Windows Privileged Escalation from a user account
properties.description: AD - Windows Privileged Escalation from a user account
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4672, 4673, 4674)
| where isnotempty(Account)
| where AccountType != "Machine"
| where Account != "AD\\SA_LanSw_Scan" //INC2851272 - This is an expected behavior for this service account through normal operations
| summarize Priviligelist=make_list(PrivilegeList), evt_count=count() by Account, EventID, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| where evt_count > 30

properties.displayName: UC-PR-1006 - Windows - User Added to Local Administrators
properties.description: Windows - User Added to Local Administrators
properties.query:
let WellKnownLocalSID = "S-1-5-32-5[0-9][0-9]$"; //unique default SIDs for local admin groups
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4732
| where TargetSid matches regex WellKnownLocalSID 
// Exclude Remote Desktop Users group: S-1-5-32-555
| where TargetSid !in ("S-1-5-32-555")
| where SubjectUserName !contains "$"
| where AccountType !contains "Machine"
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Activity,
    Computer,
    GroupAddedMemberTo = TargetAccount,
    SubjectUserName,
    SubjectUserSid,
    TargetSid

properties.displayName: UC-EX-932 - Windows - Powershell Malicious Usage Detected with Encoded Command
properties.description: Windows - Powershell Malicious Usage Detected with Encoded Command
properties.query:
let EncodedList = dynamic(['-encodedcommand', '-enc']);
// For more results use line below en filter one above. This will also return more FPs.
// let EncodedList = dynamic(['-encodedcommand', '-enc', '-e']);
let TimeFrame = 30d; //Customizable h = hours, d = days
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4688
| where TimeGenerated > ago(TimeFrame)
| where CommandLine contains "powershell" or ParentProcessName contains "powershell"
| where CommandLine has_any (EncodedList) or ParentProcessName has_any (EncodedList)
| where Computer !contains "DEV" and Computer !contains "UAT"
| where SubjectUserName !contains "sysansible"
| where AccountType !contains "machine"
| extend base64String = extract(@'\s+([A-Za-z0-9+/]{20}\S+$)', 1, CommandLine)
| extend DecodedCommandLine = base64_decode_tostring(base64String)
| where not(isempty(base64String) and isempty(DecodedCommandLine))
| where Account !contains "TEST"
//| summarize TotalEncodedExecutions = count() by Computer
| where TargetAccount !contains "CAP_SRV_NESSUS_HL"

properties.displayName: UC-CA-884 - Windows - Login Failures Followed By Success to the same Username
properties.description: Windows - Login Failures Followed By Success to the same Username
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
    | where EventID in (4624, 4625)
    | where IpAddress !in ("-","::1","127.0.0.1") and isnotempty(Account)
    | extend Outcome = iff(EventID == 4624, "Success", "Failure")
    | summarize outcome_list=make_list(Outcome),starttime=min(TimeGenerated),endtime=max(TimeGenerated),OutcomeCount=count() by Account, IpAddress, Computer,bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)
    | extend FailureBeforeSuccess = array_index_of(outcome_list, "Success")
    | where FailureBeforeSuccess >=10
    | where array_index_of(outcome_list, "Success") != 0

properties.displayName: UC-PE.PR-910 - Windows - Newly Observed Service Installed
properties.description: Windows - Newly Observed Service Installed
properties.query:
// 4697(S): A service was installed in the system. can also be included
// 7045: A Service was Installed in the System
// 7045 seems to be informational event and not available in SecurityEvent table
let List_ServiceNames= union
(Event
   | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and TimeGenerated < ago(1d)
| where EventID == 7045
| parse RenderedDescription with * 'Service Name:' ServiceName  'Service File Name:'  ServiceFileName 'Service Type:' Servicetype
| summarize List_ServiceName=make_set(ServiceName) by Computer
| project List_ServiceName
),
(SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and TimeGenerated < ago(1d)
    | where EventID in (7045,4697)
    | where ServiceName != "MMAExtensionHeartbeatService"
    | summarize List_ServiceName=make_set(ServiceName) by Computer
    | project List_ServiceName
);
union 
(SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1d)
| where EventID in (7045,4697)),
(Event
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1d)
| where EventID == 7045)
| where ServiceName in (List_ServiceNames)
| project TimeGenerated,SubjectUserName,Computer,ServiceName,ServiceFileName,ServiceAccount
    | where SubjectUserName !contains "$"

properties.displayName: UC-CA-921 - Windows - Password Spray
properties.description: Windows - Password Spray
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4625 and AccountType == "User"
| where Status in~("0xC000006A") or SubStatus in~("0xC000006A") or ( LogonType == 3)
| where Account !endswith "$"
| summarize dcount(Account), Accounts_list=make_set(Account), evtcount=count() by IpAddress,Computer, bin(TimeGenerated,5m)
| where dcount_Account>5

properties.displayName: UC-CA-1133 - Windows - Multiple Login Failures from the Same windows Workstation
properties.description: Windows - Multiple Login Failures from the Same windows Wokstation
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4625 // Event ID for failed login attempts
| where AccountType !contains "Machine"
| where isnotempty(TargetUserName) and isnotempty(Computer)
| summarize
    FailureReasons = make_set(FailureReason),
    IPAddresses = make_set(IpAddress),
    FailureCount = count(),
    LatestFailure = max(TimeGenerated)
    by Computer, Account, bin(TimeGenerated, 15min)
| where FailureCount > 25 // Adjust the threshold as needed
| project Computer, Account, FailureCount, LatestFailure, FailureReasons, IPAddresses
| order by FailureCount desc

properties.displayName: UC-CA-584 - Repeat Non-Windows Login Failures
properties.description: Repeat Non-Windows Login Failures
properties.query:
Event
| where Source !contains "office" and Source !contains "windows"
| where RenderedDescription contains "failure" and RenderedDescription contains "auth"
| where UserName !contains "N/A"

properties.displayName: UC-DE-2220 - Windows - Detect the execution of new and uncommon MSI installer files.
properties.description: Detect the execution of new and uncommon MSI installer files.
properties.query:
let timeWindow = 1d;
let expectedSoftwareNames = dynamic(["Adobe Acrobat Reader DC", "CG_Analysis for Office 365", "Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client", "Google Chrome", "Oracle Java", "Margin Minder -Salient Interactive Miner 6.20 SP3", "CG_Mersive_SolsticeClient", "Microsoft Office 365", "CG_Microsoft Visual Studio", "CG_ORTEC Map Client", "ORTEC Load Building for SAP ERP Client", "CG_ORTEC_VSOPresentationClient", "WebTitan Cloud OTG", "TeamViewer Host - EndUser Client", "SAP GUI", "Microsoft Team", "Microsoft OneDrive"]);
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(timeWindow)
| where EventID == 4688 
| where CommandLine contains ".msi"
| where AccountType !contains "Machine"
| extend Process_parsed = extract(@"\\(.+\\)*(.+)\.(.+)$",2, ParentProcessName)
| extend IsExpectedSoftware = iif(Process_parsed in~ (expectedSoftwareNames), true, false) // Check if the software is expected
| where IsExpectedSoftware == false // Filter out expected software executions
| order by TimeGenerated desc

properties.displayName: UC-DE.PR-2217 - Windows - BlueShell Malware Used in APT Attacks Targeting South Korea and Thailand
properties.description: BlueShell Malware Used in APT Attacks Targeting South Korea and Thailand

properties.displayName: UC-PE.LM.EX-1550 - Windows - Remote Scheduled Task Creation
properties.description: Detect scheduled task creation remotely
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where (EventID == 5145 and (AccessMask=="WriteData" or AccessMask=="%%4417")) and (RelativeTargetName endswith "ScheduledTasks.xml" or RelativeTargetName contains "Windows\\Tasks\\*.job")

properties.displayName: UC-PR-1106 - Windows - User running dangerous Take Ownership action
properties.description: Rule will trigger when Take Ownership action is seen on windows event
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4670
| where EventData contains "Take Ownership"

properties.displayName: UC-EX-2214 - Windows - RedEyes, a CHM Virus that Utilizes Contaminated Water from Fukushima
properties.description: RedEyes, a CHM Virus that Utilizes Contaminated Water from Fukushima
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where ParentProcessName contains "cmd.exe" and (ProcessName contains "mshta.exe" or FilePath contains "MSHTA.EXE")
| where CommandLine contains "c:\\windows\\system32\\cmd.exe navercorp" 
| summarize StartTime= min(TimeGenerated), Endtime= max(TimeGenerated), count() by ProcessName, ProcessId, ParentProcessName, ObjectName

properties.displayName: UC-PE.DE-2240 - Windows - Detection of process used  New DarkGate Variants
properties.description: CSU TI-New Loading Approach used by New DarkGate Variant
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4688
| where Process in~ ("windbg.exe", "KeyScramblerLogon.exe")
| where CommandLine  has_any ("dbgeng.dll", "SideLoader.dll")
| summarize count() by Process, CommandLine,Computer

properties.displayName: Windows- AD CS Attack
properties.description: AD CS Attack
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4885, 4886, 4887, 4888, 4889, 4890, 4891, 4892, 4893, 4894, 4895)
| where (EventID == 4886 and SubjectUserName == "SYSTEM") or (EventID in (4887, 4888, 4889, 4890, 4891, 4892, 4893, 4894, 4895) and (SubjectUserName == "Administrator" or SubjectUserName contains "admin"))
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, SubjectUserName, LogonType, EventID
| extend Reason = case(
    EventID == 4885, "Certificate Services issued a certificate",
    EventID == 4886, "Certificate Services revoked a certificate",
    EventID == 4887, "Certificate Services denied a certificate request",
    EventID == 4888, "Certificate Services published a certificate revocation list (CRL)",
    EventID == 4889, "Certificate Services loaded a certificate",
    EventID == 4890, "Certificate Services published a certificate",
    EventID == 4891, "Certificate Services completed a request",
    EventID == 4892, "Certificate Services stored a certificate",
    EventID == 4893, "Certificate Services verified a certificate",
    EventID == 4894, "Certificate Services archived a certificate",
    EventID == 4895, "Certificate Services removed a certificate",
    "Unknown"
)
| where Reason in ("Certificate Services issued a certificate", "Certificate Services revoked a certificate", "Certificate Services denied a certificate request")

properties.displayName: UC-IM-778 - Windows - Critical Service Stopped or Disabled
properties.description: Windows - Critical Service Stopped or Disabled
properties.query:
Event
|where EventID in (7036, 5025, 4881)

properties.displayName: UC-PE-1005 - Windows - User added to critical security group followed by account delete after 12 hours
properties.description: Windows - User added to critical security group followed by account delete after 12 hours
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4726
| join (SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)
    | where EventID in (4720, 4728, 4732, 4756))
    on UserPrincipalName
| summarize start_time=min(TimeGenerated), end_time=max(TimeGenerated), eventcnt=count() by Account, Computer, EventID, Account1, Computer1, SubjectUserName, SubjectUserName1, TargetUserName, TargetUserName1
| where eventcnt >= 1
| project-reorder start_time, end_time

properties.displayName: UC-PE.PR-1103 - Windows - Privileged Group Modified
properties.description: Windows - Privileged Group Modified
properties.query:
//Wachlist of Privilege groups can be added to reduce false positives
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (4735, 4737, 4755)
| where AccountType == "User"
| where TargetUserName in ("Domain Admins" , "Enterprise Admins") // Privilege groups in Heartland
| where Account !contains "$" or Account != "-" or Account != "NA"
| project TimeGenerated, IpAddress, Account, SubjectUserSid, Computer, EventID, Activity, TargetUserName, TargetSid

properties.displayName: UC-CA-867 - Windows - Excessive Failed Attempts to Access a Network Shared Resource From a Compromised Host
properties.description: Excessive Failed Attempts to Access a Network Shared Resource From a Compromised Host
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 5140
| where IpAddress in (
(_GetWatchlist('Compromised_Hosts_IP')
| project SearchKey)
)
| summarize evtcount = count() by IpAddress , bin(TimeGenerated,5m)
| where evtcount >= 3

properties.displayName: UC-EX.PE.PR-970 - Windows - Scheduled task quickly created then deleted
properties.description: Windows - Scheduled task quickly created then deleted
properties.query:
let timeframe = 1d;
let spanoftime = 10m;
let threshold = 0;
(SecurityEvent
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeframe+spanoftime)
// Scheduled Task Creation
| where EventID == 4698
| parse EventData with * '"SubjectUserName">' SubjectUserName "<" *
| parse EventData with * '"TaskName">' TaskName "<" *
| project
    creationTime = TimeGenerated,
    CreateEventID = EventID,
    CreateActivity = Activity,
    Computer = toupper(Computer),
    CreatedBySubjectUserName = SubjectUserName,
    TaskName
)
| join kind = inner 
    (SecurityEvent
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(timeframe)
    // Scheduled Task Deletion  
    | where EventID == 4699
    | parse EventData with * '"SubjectUserName">' SubjectUserName "<" *
    | parse EventData with * '"TaskName">' TaskName "<" *
    | project
        deletionTime = TimeGenerated,
        DeleteEventID = EventID,
        DeleteActivity = Activity,
        Computer = toupper(Computer),
        DeletedBySubjectUserName = SubjectUserName,
        TaskName
    )
    on Computer, TaskName
| where deletionTime - creationTime < spanoftime
| extend TimeDelta = deletionTime - creationTime
| where tolong(TimeDelta) >= threshold
| where CreatedBySubjectUserName !contains "$" and DeletedBySubjectUserName !contains "$"
| project
    TimeDelta,
    creationTime,
    CreateEventID,
    CreateActivity,
    Computer,
    deletionTime,
    DeleteEventID,
    DeleteActivity,
    CreatedBySubjectUserName,
    DeletedBySubjectUserName,
    TaskName

properties.displayName: UC-DE-1485 - Windows - Trusted Domain Removed
properties.description: Windows - Trusted Domain Removed
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where  EventSourceName == "Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing"
| where EventID == 4707
| extend HostCustomEntity = Computer

properties.displayName: UC-CA-1493 - Windows - Successful Logons to Different Users from Same Source
properties.description: Windows - Successful Logons to Different Users from Same Source
properties.query:
SecurityEvent 
| where EventID == 4624 and AccountType contains "user"
| where isnotempty(TargetUserName)
| where isnotempty(IpAddress) and IpAddress != '-' and IpAddress != '::1'
| where not(ipv4_is_private(IpAddress))
//| where IpAddress !in ((_GetWatchlist('RDP_IPs') | project SearchKey))
| summarize
    starttime=min(TimeGenerated),
    endtime=max(TimeGenerated),
    dcount(TargetUserName),
    TargetedAccount=make_set(TargetUserName),
    evtcount=count() by IpAddress, bin(TimeGenerated, 3m)
| where dcount_TargetUserName >10 and evtcount > 10

properties.displayName: UC-IM-902 - Windows - Multiple account lockout
properties.description: Windows - Multiple account lockout
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4740
| where SubjectAccount !endswith "$"
| summarize
    Starttime=min(TimeGenerated),
    Endtime=max(TimeGenerated),
    dcount(TargetUserName),dcount(Computer),computerlist=make_list(Computer),
    TargetUserlist=make_set(TargetUserName), evt_count=count()
    by SubjectUserName, bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), Computer
| where evt_count > 2

properties.displayName: UC-IM-1231 - Windows - Multiple Lockout for same Username
properties.description: Multiple Lockout for same Username in 30 minutes.
properties.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4740
| where SubjectAccount !endswith "$"
| summarize Evntcount = count() by TargetAccount //, bin(TimeGenerated,40m)
| where Evntcount >= 2
